submission_requirements.name: Submission of educational transcripts

submission_requirements.name: Eligibility to Work Proof
submission_requirements.purpose: We need to prove you are eligible for full-time employment in 2 or more of the following countries

submission_requirements.name: Confirm banking relationship or employment and residence proofs
submission_requirements.purpose: Recent bank statements or proofs of both employment and residence will be validated to initiate your loan application but not stored
